title: Easy To Quit Later - Calendar / Scheduling Tools
description: Use this gate when your scheduling need is temporary and you do not want lock-in.
A tool fails if leaving it later creates cleanup work, migration effort, or operational dependency.
Pick the option you can stop using with minimal disruption.
